title: Lucka Maattikkichi Lyrics Vasuvum Saravananum Onna Padichavanga Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Lucka Maattikkichi
Singer(s) D. Imman, Dholak Gana Jagan, Senthildass & Palaniammal
Movie : Vasuvum Saravananum Onna Padichavanga
Music : D. Imman

irukkum irukkum
pora varaikkum machaan
ava mela vachcha kadhal
nelachi irukkum

Bodha yeththa thaevayilla
wishky brandi wine-u.
en figura paartha podhum
naanum aayiduven
doiyinnu

kodi figure vandhaalum
ava thaan da
en queenu
Indha ulagathula
avathaan enakku mainu

en bikeu senja punniyam
en kooda doublesu vandhaa.
ava kayyi pattathaala
en satta kaattudhu bandhaa

Foreign-u sarakka pola
pala palanu tholu.
Wine-u bottle-la pola
gilu gilunnu kaalu.

Sampaign style pola
irukkum pechu.
avaloda kannu veechu
large-u
scotch-u

kodi figure vandhaalum
ava thaanda en queenu.
Indha ulagathula
avathaan enakku mainu

Ava jeanu potta devadha
aanaa sceneu pottu kaattala.
avala vida bejaaraa
ayyo enakku edhuvum maattala.

Romba naalu varaikkum
manasu plain boardu
Chalk-u piecea pola
potta oru kodu.
appathaan start aachu
loveu moodu
ooru kannu pattadhaala
aachu kedu.

kodi figure vandhaalum
ava thaanda en queenu.
Indha ulagathula
avathaan enakku mainu
